shortdesc.ph: Occurs when a specific remote user enables/disables the local video capturing function.

dlentry.dd:
Deprecated as of v2.9.0. This callback is deprecated, please use instead:
(0) and (5).
(2) and (6).

section.p: The SDK triggers this callback when the remote user resumes or stops capturing the video stream by calling the method.

plentry.pd: The user ID of the remote user.

pd.p:
Whether the specified remote user enables/disables the local video capturing function:
: Enable. Other users in the channel can see the video of this remote user.
: Disable. Other users in the channel can no longer receive the video stream from this remote user, while this remote user can still receive the video streams from other users.
